I am 5’4”, 34C bust, 125 lbs and typically wear size 4.  I ordered the Small peachy pink with strips.  The fabric felt very nice and the pants pockets were very convenience.  I liked the fit of the top, but the pants were much too big in the crouch.  I decided to re-order in X-Small (different color) and the pants fit and the length was fine for wearing with casual sneakers; but the top’s sleeves were too short. .  Then I realized it appears that the X-Small only comes in Petite - no regular length X-small.  That said, I like the style so I kept them both and will have the Small pants taken up to better fit my body.  With better fit I would have given it 4 stars and that plus pockets in the top would have gotten it 5 stars.

This is a fun and really cute take on the traditional sweatpants or jogger suit. The wide leg bottoms ad a bit of sass and fashion to the getup. And for some, this will be the best thing that could have EVER happened to a sweatsuit as many people really don’t like wearing clingy or tight clothes, especially to work out and sweat in. Me? I love this for a lounge outfit, an errand running get up, as well as a cute option to work out and sweat in. Its quality made. The fabric is really nice and thick- but not too thick that it will cause one to swelter from over heating. It’s just a nicely made, cute and quality two piece set.

Such a deal! Material is soft and stylish. I never was a tracksuit fan back in their height of popularity. Mainly because they weren’t for workouts. My only complaint is that it runs a bit short, I am 5'3" and this suit barely touches the top of my shoes. When I wash it I will hang it to dry because I am afraid that it will shrink in the dryer.
